definitions.definition: Any substance that inhibits the growth and reproduction of microorganisms . Generally includes only those that are used on living objects (as opposed to disinfectants ) and aren't transported by the lymphatic system to destroy bacteria in the body (as opposed to antibiotics ).

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) Any substance that inhibits the growth and reproduction of microorganisms . Generally includes only those that are used on living objects (as opposed to disinfectants ) and aren't transported by the lymphatic system to destroy bacteria in the body (as opposed to antibiotics ).
